data_table.description: Participant ID, ethnicity, race, gender, aliquots plasma, family history of health and disease events including colon or rectal cancer, participant history of colon polyps, prior malignancy, new tumor event, and synchronous colon and rectal cancer, history of participant received tumor treatment including chemotherapy, tumor characteristics including tumor pathology, BRAF, KRAS, NRAS< MLH1, MSH2, MSH6 analysis, tumor histology, lymph node examination, detection of microsatellite instability in tumor, venipuncture, Case Report Form, new tumor diagnostic method, method of sample collection, participant weight and height, pathologic diagnosis, tumor stage, CEA level, vital status, participant pharmaceutical treatment, radiation treatment, surgery for the new tumor, targeted molecular therapy, post-operative pharmaceutical therapy, post-operative radiation therapy, post-operative targeted molecular therapy, anesthesia time of participants with colon tumors and involved in the "Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium (CPTAC) Proteogenomic Confirmatory Study of Breast, Colon, Lung, and Ovarian Tumors" project.

variable.name: Participant_ID
variable.description: De-Identified subject (participant) ID, from the pre-printed labels that are part of the procurement package provided by the BCR.

variable.name: CRF_Name
variable.description: Information collected on Case Report Form (CRF) at [Submission; Baseline; 1 year follow-up; 5 year follow-up]

variable.name: Participant_Procurement_Age
variable.description: Provide the participant age in months at the time of tissue procurement.

variable.name: Participant_Gender
variable.description: Participant gender using the defined categories. [Male; Female; Unknown; Unspecified]

variable.name: Participant_Race
variable.description: Participant race using the defined categories. Options = American Indian or Alaska Native; Asian; White; Black or African American; Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander; Not Evaluated; Unknown (Could not be determined or unsure).

variable.name: Participant_Ethnicity
variable.description: Ethnicity using the defined categories. [Not Hispanic or Latino; Hispanic or Latino; Not Evaluated; Unknown]

variable.name: Participant_History_Malignancy
variable.description: Indicate whether the participant has a history of prior malignancies. Note 1: If this question cannot be answered because the answer is unknown, the case will be excluded from CPTAC. Note 2: If the participant has any history of prior malignancies, please complete an Other Malignancy Form for each malignancy diagnosed prior to the procurement of the tissue submitted for CPTAC. If the participant has a history of multiple diagnoses of basal cell skin cancers, complete an Other Malignancy Form for the first diagnosis for each of these types. [No; Yes, Only Basal Cell Skin Cancer Within the Last Year; Yes, History of Other Cancer Greater Than One Year Ago]

variable.name: Participant_History_Chemotherapy
variable.description: Did participant ever received systematic chemotherapy for any previous cancer. [No; Yes]

variable.name: Participant_History_Neo-adjuvant_Treatment
variable.description: Did participant received therapy for this cancer prior to sample procurement of the tumor submitted for CPTAC. If the participant did receive treatment for this cancer prior to procurement, the TSS should contact the BCR for further instructions. Note: Systemic treatment and certain localized therapies (those administered to the same site as the CPTAC submitted tissue) given prior to procurement of the sample submitted for CPTAC are exclusionary. [Yes; Yes, Pharmaceutical Treatment Prior to Resection; Yes, Radiation Prior to Resection; Yes, Both Radiation and Pharmaceutical Treatment Prior to Resection; No]

variable.name: Aliquots_Plasma
variable.description: Number of tubes of plasma obtained from the participant.

variable.name: Blood_Collection_Time
variable.description: The 24-hr clock time on the day of when the CPTAC blood sample(s) was/were collected from the participant.

variable.name: Blood_Collection_Method
variable.description: Method for obtaining the blood sample. [Venipuncture (Vacutainer Apparatus); Venipuncture (Syringe); IV Catheter ]

variable.name: Anesthesia_Time
variable.description: Time when anesthesia was administered to the participant.

variable.name: Mesentary_Divided_Time
variable.description: The 24-hr clock time of when the mesentery containing the tumor was divided.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_Number
variable.description: Specify the number of segments of the tumor that were removed and saved to the CPTAC-provided cryomolds.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_1_Weight
variable.description: Weight of tumor segment in mg.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_1_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when tumor segment 1 was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_2_Weight
variable.description: Weight of tumor segment in mg.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_2_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the tumor segment 2 was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_3_Weight
variable.description: Weight of tumor segment in mg.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_3_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the tumor sample or portion was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_4_Weight
variable.description: Weight of tumor segment in mg.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_4_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the tumor sample or portion was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_5_Weight
variable.description: Weight of tumor segment in mg.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_5_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the tumor sample or portion was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_Number
variable.description: Specify the number of normal segments that were removed and saved to the CPTAC-provided cryomolds.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_1_Weight
variable.description: Weight of normal segment in mg.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_1_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the normal segment was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_2_Weight
variable.description: Weight of normal segment in mg.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_2_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the normal segment was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_3_Weight
variable.description: Weight of normal segment in mg.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_3_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the normal segment was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_4_Weight
variable.description: Weight of normal segment in mg.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_4_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the normal segment was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_5_Weight
variable.description: Weight of normal segment in mg.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_5_LN2_Time
variable.description: The 24-hour clock time when the normal segment was immersed in LN2 vapor.

variable.name: Primary_Site_Disease
variable.description: Using the participant pathology/laboratory report, select the anatomic site of disease of the tumor submitted for CPTAC. [Colon]

variable.name: Histological_Subtype
variable.description: Using the participant pathology/laboratory report, select the histology of the tumor submitted for CPTAC. [Mucinous; Not Mucinous]

variable.name: Colon_Sub-sites
variable.description: Using the participant pathology/laboratory report, select the anatomic organ subdivision of the tumor submitted for CPTAC. [Cecum; Ascending Colon; Hepatix Flexure; Tranverse Colon; Splenic Flexure; Descending Colon; Sigmoid Colon]

variable.name: Rectum_Sub-sites
variable.description: Using the patient pathology/laboratory report, select the anatomic organ subdivision of the tumor submitted for CPTAC. [Rectum; Rectosigmoid Junction]

variable.name: Pathologic_Spread_Primary_Tumor
variable.description: Code for the pathologic T (primary tumor) as defined by the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC). [T1; T2; T3; T4; T4a; T4b]

variable.name: Pathologic_Spread_Lymph_Nodes
variable.description: Code for the pathologic N (nodal) as defined by the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC). [NX; N0; N1; N1a; N1b; N1c; N2; N2a; N2b; N3]

variable.name: Pathologic_Spread_Distant_Metastases
variable.description: Code for the pathologic M (metastasis) as defined by the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC). [MX; M0; M1]

variable.name: Tumor_Stage_Pathological
variable.description: Using the participant pathology/laboratory report, in conjunction with the participant medical record, select the stage as defined by the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC). [Stage I; Stage II; Stage IIA; Stage IIB; Stage IIC; Stage III; Stage IIIA]

variable.name: Residual_Tumor
variable.description: Using the pathology/laboratory report, select the tissue margin status at the time of surgical resection for the tumor submitted for CPTAC. [ R0; R1; R2; RX]

variable.name: Lymph_Nodes_Examined
variable.description: Indicate whether any lymph nodes were examined at the time of the primary resection for the tumor submitted to CPTAC. [No; Yes]

variable.name: Lymph_Nodes_Examined_Number
variable.description: Number of lymph nodes pathologically assessed if one or more lymph nodes were removed.

variable.name: Lymph_Nodes_Positive_Hematoxylin_Eosin_Staining_Number
variable.description: Number of lymph nodes identified as positive through hematoxylin and eosin (H&E) staining and light microscopy.

variable.name: Lymph_Nodes_Positive_IHC_Keratin_Staining_Number
variable.description: Provide the number of lymph nodes identified as positive through keratin immunohistochemistry (IHC) staining.

variable.name: Preoperative_or_Pretreatment_CEA_Level
variable.description: Carcinoembryonic antigen or CEA level (ng/ml) prior to the resection of tumor submitted to CPTAC.

variable.name: Circumferential_Resection_Margin_CRM
variable.description: Measured length (mm) between a malignant lesion of the colon or rectum and the nearest radial (or circumferential) border of tissue removed during surgery for the tumor submitted to CPTAC.

variable.name: Vascular_Invasion_Present
variable.description: Indicate if large vessel or venous invasion was pathologically present in the tumor specimen submitted to CPTAC. [Yes; No; Unknown]

variable.name: Lymphatic_Invasion_Present
variable.description: Indicate if malignant cells are pathologically present in small or thin walled vessels suggesting lymphatic involvement in the tumor submitted to CPTAC. [Yes; No; Unknown]

variable.name: Perineural_Invasion_Present
variable.description: Indicate if perineural invasion or infiltration of tumor or cancer is pathologically present in tumor submitted to CPTAC. [Yes; No; Unknown]

variable.name: Synchronous_Colon_Rectal_Tumors
variable.description: Indicate whether the participant had a synchronous colon or rectal cancer present at the time tissue was procured for CPTAC. [Yes; No; Unknown]

variable.name: Colon_Polyps_History
variable.description: Indicate if the participant had a previous history of colon polyps as noted in the history/physical or previous endoscopic report(s). [Yes; No; Unknown]

variable.name: Colon_Polyps_Present
variable.description: Indicate if polyps were present in the colon, surgically and/or pathologically, at the time of tissue collection for the tumor submitted to CPTAC. [Yes; No; Unknown]

variable.name: Participant_Weight
variable.description: Provide the weight of the participant measured in kilograms.

variable.name: Participant_Height
variable.description: Provide the height of the participant in centimeters.

variable.name: First_Degree_Relatives_with_Colon.Rectal_Cancer
variable.description: The number of first degree relatives (parent, sibling and/or child) associated with a diagnosis of colon or rectal cancer.

variable.name: First_Degree_Relatives
variable.description: Total number of first degree relatives (parents, sibling and/or children) . A record of a participant background regarding health and disease events of blood relatives. A participant family medical history may be important in diagnosing existing conditions.

variable.name: Microsatellite_Instability_Abnormal
variable.description: Indicate whether microsatellite instability was present in more than 33% of loci tested in the tumor submitted to CPTAC. [Yes; No; Unknown; Not Tested]

variable.name: MSI_Loci_Tested
variable.description: If microsatellite instability was identified, indicate the number of loci tested to detect recessive mutations in the tumor submitted to CPTAC.

variable.name: MSI_Loci_Abnormal
variable.description: Number of loci found to be abnormal during testing to detect microsatellite instability in the tumor submitted to CPTAC.

variable.name: IHC_Mismatch_Repair_Proteins_Tested
variable.description: Was testing performed to identify any loss of expression in mismatch repair proteins tested by immunohistochemistry (IHC)? Note: If not performed, skip to question 50 KRAS Gene Analysis Performed. [Yes; No; Unknown]

variable.name: Gene_Espression_MLH1
variable.description: Indicate any loss of expression of mismatch repair proteins by immunohistochemistry (IHC) is or is not expressed for each of the listed genes. [MLH1-not tested; MLH1-not expressed; MLH1-expressed]

variable.name: Gene_Espression_MSH2
variable.description: Indicate any loss of expression of mismatch repair proteins by immunohistochemistry (IHC) is or is not expressed for each of the listed genes. [MLH2-not tested; MLH2-not expressed; MLH2-expressed]

variable.name: Gene_Espression_PMS2
variable.description: Indicate any loss of expression of mismatch repair proteins by immunohistochemistry (IHC) is or is not expressed for each of the listed genes. [PMS2-not tested; PMS2-not expressed; PMS2-expressed]

variable.name: Gene_Espression_MSH6
variable.description: Indicate any loss of expression of mismatch repair proteins by immunohistochemistry (IHC) is or is not expressed for each of the listed genes. [MLH6-not tested; MLH6-not expressed; MLH6-expressed]

variable.name: Gene_Analysis_KRAS
variable.description: Indicate if KRAS gene analysis was performed on tumor submitted for CPTAC. Note: If not performed, skip to question 53 BRAF Gene Analysis Performed [Yes; No; Unknown]

variable.name: Gene_Mutation_Found_KRAS
variable.description: If KRAS gene analysis was performed indicate if KRAS Mutation was found. [No; Yes]

variable.name: Gene_Mutation_Codon_KRAS
variable.description: If KRAS mutation was identified indicate the specific codon.

variable.name: Gene_Mutation_Found_NRAS
variable.description: If NRAS gene analysis was performed indicate if NRAS Mutation was found. [No; Yes]

variable.name: Gene_Mutation_Codon_NRAS
variable.description: If NRAS mutation was identified indicate the specific codon.

variable.name: Gene_Analysis_BRAF
variable.description: Indicate if BRAF gene analysis was performed on tumor submitted for CPTAC. Note: If not performed, skip to question 55 Synchronous Colon/Rectal Tumor(s) at Time of Tissue Collection. [No; Yes]

variable.name: Gene_Analysis_Results_BRAF
variable.description: If BRAF gene analysis was performed indicate the result. [Normal; Abnormal, Codon 600; Abnormal, other]

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_1_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_2_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_3_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_4_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Tumor_Sample_5_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_1_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_2_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_3_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_4_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.

variable.name: Normal_Sample_5_Ischemia_Time
variable.description: Calculated ischemia time. The difference between time of immersion in LN2 and mesentery divided time.
